name: Repeat (SWalrus)
description:
A puzzle game where you can press each button only once before reaching checkpoint. There are only 6 buttons: 4 arrow to move, X to return to a checkpoint and Z to repeat the last movement. So manage your controls carefully. Made in 48 hours for GMTK Game Jam 2020 with theme "out of control" (out of controls... you get it).

Tip: last movement does not reset after returning to checkpoint. This is an important mechanic, so keep it in mind.
